issue.title: [C++] StringArray/BinaryArray comparisons may be incorrect when values with non-zero length are null
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-537](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-537). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
see code review comments in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/322

because we compare the entire data range without regards to nullness, this may compare null data segments which should be ignored

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-537?focusedCommentId=15857637) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 327
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/327>
